authors: St. Louis Blues Hockey Club, LP
data.meta_description: The official app of the St. Louis Blues, Enterprise Center and Stifel Theatre. Content customized for each fan, based on your location and preferences. Follow aâ¦
data.text:
I'm starting to love this app already, I may rely on it than "The Score" app for everything Blues. Probably the only thing I find wrong with it is the goal horn music, but that's just me. I guess I'm of the very few who'd like to hear the most current goal horn music that can be found at a website that I'll link to you guys through App Support. It's just a suggestion for a more updated song without the whistle at the end. I don't mind if you guys won't change, but if you ever want to, there's my suggestion.

The âlistenâ button on the home page which gives you the radio broadcast is broken. The broadcast will play for a couple of minutes and stops. There should also be a second screen, after you click listen, where you can rewind the broadcast or pause it. Otherwise itâs a great app.
